subject: Re: Acoufelt Site Update Review
preview: Hi Criselda,  We have cleared the site and server cache. Can you please try again? Her's how it looks like on my end.  Regarding the PINK search would you be able to elaborate what should show up?   F

full_threads.body:
Hi Criselda,

We have cleared the site and server cache. Can you please try again? Her's how it looks like on my end.

Regarding the PINK search would you be able to elaborate what should show up?

Filter sidebarm, it should be working fine now we have disabled the sticky options.

Hi Joel

Jumping in here

I'm doing a quick review now and I'm not sure if I'm seeing the updated page. I can still see the 'version 2 design' and when I typed pink in the search bar, nothing comes up.

Also, I can't seem to see all the filter options and the filter pane on the left overlaps the footer when you scroll down to the bottom.

See screenshots below.





Thanks!

Warm regards,

Criselda Romero
Digital Marketing Manager



T: +61 1800 626 462
acoufelt.com

Hi Keenan,

I hope all is well.

We have made updates to the site.

  • Can you remove all the WBQ from the colour drop down and add them into the 'wood' drop down below and change 'wood' to 'wood finishes' *DONE
  • SEA Salt, change to Sea not all caps *DONE
  • Remove 'version 2 design' from the 'solution' tab *DONE
  • Under 'size' 1200 x 1200 can you add mm to that, I made that slight error but cant seem to change it *DONE
  • Sub text under the product name i.e 'Linear, Ripple, Wing, Arc & Curve' can you reduce the text size by 4px, go from 19px to 15px *DONE
  • If a user searches for a colour but doesn't know the actual name, for example if a user types pink, can any pink colour appear below the search that way its notifying the user that there are colours classed as pink *Yes, this is how it is setup, we have added the keywords you have sent to us.

  • Is it possible to as well once a user has click a colour that under the search bar, the colour scan of that colour appears, that way they can see the colour they have selected and possibly they can order that sample from this page as well? Or if that's too much hassle, could there be a link to the colourways pop up that appears? *We will have to create a code that can achieve this feature.
  • Is it possible to still have this feature (screenshot attached). If a user searches for a product like fracture, all the fracture patterns appear. This function woild appear on anything that has variants of patterns and designs *This will be custom coding, and may need a few post type.

Thanks Joel.

Is it possible to still have this feature (screenshot attached). If a user searches for a product like fracture, all the fracture patterns appear. This function woild appear on anything that has variants of patterns and designs

Warm regards,

Keenan Druce
Creative Lead



T: +61 1800 626 462
Level 43, 264 George Street, Sydney, NSW, 2000
acoufelt.com

Hi Keenan,

I hope all is well.

We will work on this and update you next week :)

Hey Joel, Getting closer and closer but a few minor things to fix
  • Can you remove all the WBQ from the colour drop down and add them into the 'wood' drop down below and change 'wood' to 'wood finishes'
  • SEA Salt, change to Sea not all caps
  • Remove 'version 2 design' from the 'solution' tab
  • Under 'size' 1200 x 1200 can you add mm to that, I made that slight error but cant seem to change it
  • Sub text under the product name i.e 'Linear, Ripple, Wing, Arc & Curve' can you reduce the text size by 4px, go from 19px to 15px
  • If a user searches for a colour but doesn't know the actual name, for example if a user types pink, can any pink colour appear below the search that way its notifying the user that there are colours classed as pink
  • Is it possible to as well once a user has click a colour that under the search bar, the colour scan of that colour appears, that way they can see the colour they have selected and possibly they can order that sample from this page as well? Or if that's too much hassle, could there be a link to the colourways pop up that appears?
Let me know how you go with these changes and if some of them are possible, if not let me know what a suitable solution for these would be Warm regards, Keenan Druce Creative Lead T: +61 1800 626 462 Level 43, 264 George Street, Sydney, NSW, 2000 acoufelt.com
Thanks @andy @cindy!
Noted on this @andy

Well done managing this @joel .

@cindy 56 threads on this one! 😮

Lets pull this out to Custom Development next time @cindy so doesn't impact our Support SLAs.

Hi Keenan,

I hope all is well.

We have updated the filter and let us know if this works for you?

Thanks Joel,

I'm wondering should we have some text that notifies the user that 'azur' is available in the following products otherwise users may not even notice the change

Warm regards,

Keenan Druce
Creative Lead

Hi Keenan,

Sure, the colour serves as a filter.
If you select Driftwood: Any solutions that has a Woodbequiet Driftwood colourways will show up in the list.
If you select Azur: Any solutions that has a Filasorb Azur colourways will show up in the list.

I hope this message finds you well.

We’ve recently made some updates to the Collections page. Colourways and keywords have been added and are now integrated into the search filters.

If you have any further feedback or would like to explore additional adjustments, I’d be happy to arrange a quick call to walk through everything together.

Looking forward to hearing your thoughts.
